author: Mother Teresa
message: We can do no great things, only small things with great love.
title: Thought of the day

author: Kahlil Gibran
message: Be like the flower, turn your face to the sun.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: Remembering a wrong is like carrying a burden on the mind.
title: Thought of the day

author: James Openheim
message: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; the wise grows it under his feet.
title: Thought of the day
